articles.title: Biden Responds to Sen. Tim Scott: 'I Don't Think The American People Are Racist' - NPR
articles.description: In an interview with NBC, the president addressed a critique by the South Carolina senator by saying the legacy of slavery and Jim Crow continues to leave Black Americans "behind the eight ball."
articles.content:
President Biden says America has "to deal with" the aftereffects of slavery and Jim Crow laws
Evan Vucci/AP

articles.title: How Apple's 'Mosquito Coast' changes the book for the worse - Los Angeles Times
articles.description: Justin Theroux stars in Apple's spin on his uncle Paul's novel about an American family abroad. But the people they meet there are mostly cartoons.

articles.title: As America reckons with racism, Kamala Harris puts her identity as the first Black VP front and center - USA TODAY
articles.description: In her first 100 days, Kamala Harris has put a heavy emphasis on issues of race and inequity. “The truth is inequity has become the norm,” she says.
articles.content:
